Hi. My name is Irene.

I enjoy building things for website.

I am anambitious, hard-working and fast learning self-taught web developer. In late January 2020, I start learning basic HTML, CSS and Javascript. Now, I am able and confident to build

  • individual section layout using Flexbox / Grid
  • a simple website using HTML and (S)CSS
  • multiple pages website using node js and express
  • reusable components using React js
  • simple blog template website using API and MongoDB
  • client side javascript to enhance user experience
  • simple log in validation using react-redux
Full qualifications

Recent projects

Animated Page with Pure CSS

This is a simple ladning page with animated background, persudo classes for background overlay pattern. Using vanillia simple JS (window.onload) to tricker the animation to load in the element.

Clone Facebook navbar using React

Currently working on cloning new Facebook nav bar layout using React Js. I use react hook (useState) to empower dropdown menu and its animation. Desktop version is done, I am still working on tablet and mobile responsive version.

JS form validation

This is a simple HTML form validation using javascript to check validity between definted pattern (regular expression) and user input. Validation includes email format, strict password (min length 8 characters with at least one uppercase and one special character)
